      • getStreamMetadata

        com.dreamlab.edgefs.thrift.StreamMetadataInfo getStreamMetadata(java.lang.String streamId,
                                                                boolean checkNeighbors,
                                                                boolean checkBuddies,
                                                                boolean forceLatest)
                                                         throws org.apache.thrift.TException
        Parameters:
        streamId - the id of the stream
        checkNeighbors - if true calls the getStreamMetadata of the neighbors
        checkBuddies - if true calls the getStreamMetadata of the buddies
        forceLatest - if true gets the latest metadata for the given streamid
        Returns:
        Throws:
        org.apache.thrift.TException

      • getWriteLocations

        java.util.List<com.dreamlab.edgefs.thrift.WritableFogData> getWriteLocations(byte dataLength,
                                                                             com.dreamlab.edgefs.thrift.Metadata metadata,
                                                                             java.util.List<java.lang.Short> blackListedFogs,
                                                                             boolean isEdge)
                                                                      throws org.apache.thrift.TException
        Parameters:
        dataLength - the length of the microbatch
        metadata - contains clientId, session secret, microbatchid, streamid etc
        blackListedFogs - the list of fogs which do not want to be selected for writing data
        isEdge - whether the client is edge or not
        Returns:
        A list of Write locations . this contains write perferences, fog locations ( and edge locations)
        Throws:
        org.apache.thrift.TException

      • write

        com.dreamlab.edgefs.thrift.WriteResponse write(com.dreamlab.edgefs.thrift.Metadata mbMetadata,
                                               java.nio.ByteBuffer data,
                                               com.dreamlab.edgefs.thrift.WritePreference preference)
                                        throws org.apache.thrift.TException
        Parameters:
        mbMetadata - the metadata corresponding to the microbatch, contains clientId, session secret, microbatchid, sreamid etc
        data - the actual data in bytes
        preference - can be one of the HH, HL, LH, LL etc
        Returns:
        reliability and write status
        Throws:
        org.apache.thrift.TException

      • find

        java.util.List<com.dreamlab.edgefs.thrift.FindReplica> find(long microbatchId,
                                                            boolean checkNeighbors,
                                                            boolean checkBuddies,
                                                            com.dreamlab.edgefs.thrift.EdgeInfoData selfInfo)
                                                     throws org.apache.thrift.TException
        Parameters:
        microbatchId - id of the microbatch being searched
        checkNeighbors - if true the query is sent to neighbors.
        checkBuddies - if true the query is sent to buddies
        selfInfo - The ip, port etc of the edge client that is currently trying to query
        Returns:
        The list of fog (and edge) locations where the requested microbatch is present
        Throws:
        org.apache.thrift.TException

                                            boolean fetchMetadata)
                                     throws org.apache.thrift.TException
        Parameters:
        microbatchId - id of the microbatch being read
        fetchMetadata - if true reads the metadata
        Returns:
        ReadReplica which contains either data or the metadata of microbatch

        org.apache.thrift.TException

      • getMeta

        com.dreamlab.edgefs.thrift.ReadReplica getMeta(long microbatchId,
                                               boolean checkNeighbors,
                                               boolean checkBuddies)
                                        throws org.apache.thrift.TException
        Parameters:
        microbatchId - id of the microbatch for which metadata is needed
        checkNeighbors - if true search for metadata in neighbors
        checkBuddies - if true search for metadata in buddies
        Returns:
        which contains metadata of microbatch
        Throws:
        org.apache.thrift.TException

      • open

        com.dreamlab.edgefs.thrift.OpenStreamResponse open(java.lang.String streamId,
                                                   java.lang.String clientId,
                                                   int expectedLease,
                                                   boolean setLease)
                                            throws org.apache.thrift.TException
        Parameters:
        streamId - the id of the stream (which is already registered) that needs to be opened
        clientId - the client id which is querying
        expectedLease - the duration of the lease expected by the client
        setLease - if true a lease is granted for a set period of time else no lease is granted.
        Returns:
        success status, lease , last block id,session secret etc.,
        Throws:
        org.apache.thrift.TException

      • incrementBlockCount

        com.dreamlab.edgefs.thrift.BlockMetadataUpdateResponse incrementBlockCount(com.dreamlab.edgefs.thrift.Metadata mbMetadata,
                                                                           boolean setLease)
                                                                    throws org.apache.thrift.TException
        Parameters:
        mbMetadata - the metadata corresponding to the microbatch, contains clientId, session secret, microbatchid, sreamid etc
        setLease - if true a lease is granted for a set period of time else no lease is granted.
        Returns:
        success status, code and an optional message.
        Throws:
        org.apache.thrift.TException

      • renewLease

        com.dreamlab.edgefs.thrift.StreamLeaseRenewalResponse renewLease(java.lang.String streamId,
                                                                 java.lang.String clientId,
                                                                 java.lang.String sessionSecret,
                                                                 int expectedLease,
                                                                 boolean setLease)
                                                          throws org.apache.thrift.TException
        Parameters:
        streamId - the id of the stream for which lease is going to be renewed.
        clientId - the id of the client which is querying
        sessionSecret - the session-secret that is maintained for the session
        expectedLease - the duration of the lease expected by the client
        setLease - if true a lease is granted for a set period of time else no lease is granted.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        org.apache.thrift.TException

      • getLargestBlockId

        long getLargestBlockId(java.lang.String streamId)
                throws org.apache.thrift.TException
        Parameters:
        streamId - the id of the stream (which is already registered)
        Returns:
        the largest microbatch id written under this stream.
        Throws:
        org.apache.thrift.TException
